summary: This is an FBI form documenting an IRS forensic accounting analysis of bank accounts for Jeffrey Epstein's company, Gratitude America Ltd. The analysis was conducted as part of a wire fraud investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Subject of investigation, owner of company
persons.context: The document is an FBI record of an IRS forensic accounting review of bank accounts for his company, Gratitude America Ltd, as part of a wire fraud investigation.

events.title: IRS Forensic Accounting Analysis
events.description: The IRS had a contract forensic accountant conduct a review of bank accounts for Jeffrey Epstein's company, Gratitude America Ltd.

keyFacts: The IRS conducted a forensic accounting analysis of bank accounts for Jeffrey Epstein's company, Gratitude America Ltd.
The analysis was documented by the FBI on April 26, 2021, under case ID 272B-SJ-3262541.
The investigation synopsis mentions 'Wire Fraud' and involves entities named 'SOUTHERN TRUST' and 'SOUTHERN COUNTRY INTERNATIONAL'.
